snippets.name: slug-generator
snippets.purpose: Generate URL-safe slugs from strings. Use for blog posts, product URLs, etc.
snippets.usage:
import { generateSlug, uniqueSlug } from './utils/slug';

const slug = generateSlug('Hello World!'); // 'hello-world'

snippets.name: jwt-utils
snippets.description: JSON Web Token signing and verification
snippets.purpose: Utility functions for handling JWT operations outside of middleware.
snippets.usage:
import { signToken, verifyToken } from './utils/jwt';

const token = signToken({ id: '123', email: 'user@example.com' });

snippets.name: otp-generator
snippets.purpose: Implement Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) with standard TOTP algorithms.
snippets.usage:
import { generateSecret, verifyToken } from './utils/otp';

const { secret, uri } = generateSecret('user@example.com');
